nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Heavy Pearl\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"It can take years for\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"Hellwisp to create a pearl, but\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"the Matriarch secretes so much\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"fluid that it can make multiple\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"of those pearls every day.\",\"color\":\"gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"* \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true},{\"text\":\"Soulbound \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"*\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"bold\":true}]}","{\"text\":\"LEGENDARY\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"HEAVY_PEARL"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{},"minecraft:profile":{"properties":{"textures":[{"value":""}]},"name":"textures"}}}
